sentences.en: He is pale, dark, and authoritative, with the gravitas you might expect of a Nobel prize winner.
sentences.cn: 他面色苍白、皮肤呈深色、有权威性，带着你可能期待的一位诺贝尔奖得主的那种庄严。

sentences.en: The manager could well have been smart in buying Edwin van der Sar to bring gravitas.
sentences.cn: 买入范德萨稳固后防实在是主教练的明智之举.

words.tran_cn: 重力，地心引力；严重性；庄严

trans.tran_en: a seriousness of manner that people respect
